Commands:
  MANIPULATOR:SEARCH|CHARGER
  MOBILE:NAVIGATE|MANIPULATOR_STATION
  MANIPULATOR:GRASP|CHARGER
  MOBILE:WAIT_FOR_LOAD|NULL
  MANIPULATOR:PLACE_ON_ROBOT|NULL
  SYNC:HANDOFF_INITIATED|NULL
  MANIPULATOR:RELEASE|NULL
  MOBILE:NAVIGATE|USER_CURRENT
  SYSTEM:MISSION_COMPLETE|NULL
Description: Locating charger, coordinating handoff, delivering to bed.

Commands:
  MANIPULATOR:SEARCH|RED_PEN
  MOBILE:NAVIGATE|MANIPULATOR_STATION
  MANIPULATOR:GRASP|RED_PEN
  MOBILE:WAIT_FOR_LOAD|NULL
  MANIPULATOR:PLACE_ON_ROBOT|NULL
  SYNC:HANDOFF_INITIATED|NULL
  MANIPULATOR:RELEASE|NULL
  MOBILE:NAVIGATE|KITCHEN
  SYSTEM:MISSION_COMPLETE|NULL
Description: Locating red pen, coordinating handoff, delivering to cooking area.

  MANIPULATOR:RELEASE|NULL
  MOBILE:NAVIGATE|OFFICE

  MANIPULATOR:SEARCH|HEADPHONES
  MOBILE:NAVIGATE|MANIPULATOR_STATION
  MANIPULATOR:GRASP|HEADPHONES
  MOBILE:WAIT_FOR_LOAD|NULL
  MANIPULATOR:PLACE_ON_ROBOT|NULL
  SYNC:HANDOFF_INITIATED|NULL
  MANIPULATOR:RELEASE|NULL
  MOBILE:NAVIGATE|USER_CURRENT
  SYSTEM:MISSION_COMPLETE|NULL
Description: Locating headphones, coordinating handoff, delivering to bedroom.

Commands:
  MANIPULATOR:SEARCH|SCREWDRIVER
  MOBILE:NAVIGATE|MANIPULATOR_STATION
  MANIPULATOR:GRASP|SCREWDRIVER
  MOBILE:WAIT_FOR_LOAD|NULL
  MANIPULATOR:PLACE_ON_ROBOT|NULL
  SYNC:HANDOFF_INITIATED|NULL
  MANIPULATOR:RELEASE|NULL
  MOBILE:NAVIGATE|OFFICE
  SYSTEM:MISSION_COMPLETE|NULL
Description: Locating screwdriver, coordinating handoff, delivering to desk.
